name: I Think I Might Die Here
name_original: I Think I Might Die Here
description:
NOTE - BEST PLAYED WITH HIGH BRIGHTNESS AND HARDWARE ACCELERATION ENABLED

Made in 2 days for the 2022 2D Spooky Jam. I had a lot of fun working on this--it's been too long since I've done a jam! I love autumn and I'm quite happy with the 'vibe' encapsulated in this game, although I *really* wish I could've made the level longer...

Cover art, some sprites, and playtesting done by my sibling Oli.
Everything else done by me.
